item.title: [317 delta] Need help with a portal
item.dc:creator: @project_fallout project fallout
item.description:
@project_fallout wrote:

then in clicking on objects, find case 2475: or create it

if you found it, then add in it

if(/*donator status int*/ == 1){ toX = 2735 toY = 3752 } else { /*stuff already in there*/ } break;

otherwise

if(/*donator status int*/ == 1){ toX = 2735 toY = 3752 } break;

item.title: [317 delta] Need help with a portal
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“sk1llmunky, post:1, topic:303210”]i need help making a portal i dont no rly how to make global objects that well and i want to make it a donator only portal

X:2735
Y:3472

Portal: 2475

if sum1 could help that would be helpful thank you[/quote]

Search for “makeGlobalObject” in client.java.

You’ll see something like this:

makeGlobalObject(3509, 9496, 3831, 0, 10);

Make one for your portal like this:

makeGlobalObject(2735, 3472, 2475, 0, 10);
“makeGlobalObject(coordsX, coordsY, ObjectID, HeightLevel, 10);”

Read full topic
item.source: [317 delta] Need help with a portal
